secText:
Lesson:
1. Identify [OBJ:expsec_b761:scalars].
2. Identify and define [OBJ:expsec_b762:vectors].
3. Define and calculate [OBJ:expsec_b763:displacement].
4. Define and calculate [OBJ:expsec_b764:velocity].
5. Determine the relationship between speed and velocity by [OBJ:actsec_c4512:driving a car].
